short.en: Provides more hooks to GLPI plugins.

long.en:
# mhooks To provide more hooks to GLPI plugins using runkit integration. In particular currently providing pre_show_item and post_show_item for Ticket, TicketFollowup, CommonGLPI, Computer and Reminder items And providing show_form_buttons and show_form_header to TicketFollowup (this is used by plugin TicketDocument: to come).
Currently tested with:
GLPI 0.83, 0.85 and 0.90
PHP 5.3, 5.4
# Pre-requisites: This plugin needs 'runkit' PHP module.
